output_list.description: mintToken function allows arbitrary increase of total supply, aka 'token Devalue' issue.
freezeAccount function allows owner to freeze accounts, allowing asset theft.
setPrices function allows owner to set sell and buy price, allowing arbitrary price manipulation.
buy function does not check return value of msg.sender.transfer(), allowing arbitrary Ether theft.
sell function does not check return value of msg.sender.transfer(), allowing arbitrary Ether theft.
